column4: Windows is great for games because of hardware. DOS is better for games than windows but Windows is the happy medium. Wine for games is just frivilous but more power to those that can get them working.
god they didn't even have mame when i used dos, we had the actual nintendo system lol
Advancemame has a livecd based on DOS. works great because of direct hardware access.
did you use dos back in the BBS days?
yeah i started working with PC back in 90 or so.
around when i did you prolly had a 2/386 by then
but I hooked up to UT Tarus mainframe from school in 79.
not familiar with those, only dos lol and bbs's man i used to love them
nice bro i had an sx also
remember having to upgrade cache as well as RAM... that sucked!
lol i never upgraded bro i had the xt untl the 386 was out
i do remember having to fuck with dipswitches when instaling a modem
for setting, had like 4, i want to say all up ---- was comm 1 , --__ was 2, __-- was 3 and all down ____ was comm four
remember applying for private boards man?
have that crazy application to prove you were elite?
when I was programming in high school, the modem was a handset that you placed in the cradle... can't remember what speed.
